entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 1 May 2023
